WorkItem.ClosedComment: Items (not buffs/etc, just items) with spellpower will not be considered relevant in the next version.
WorkItem.Description:
It is a small thing, but some other models have similar filters on the options tab.
Â 
The only time it is ever an issue for me is when building an upgrade list eg. from ICC or Frost Emblems etc.   Basically, being able to filter out the Spellpower would more than halve the number of items it parses through and make these upgrade lists much quicker.
